attributes.additional_details: I am now homeschooling my daughter because of the abuse she was getting from teachers about her uniform - nails, hair colour ect, children would have less mental health issues if they were left alone to be themselves and teachers do their job and teach!
attributes.background: Teachers are more bothered about the children’s appearance these days instead of the fact they are there to teach! Times have changed, children are non binary, trans ect they should be allowed to express themselves with their image

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the enforcing of school dress codes and how it can have an effect on students and teachers but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You may like to sign the below petitions we currently have open on this topic:

Ban mandatory school uniforms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591532

Require schools to have gender-neutral uniform policies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597731
